17557.<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……: <start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>……天命之女武神！甦醒吧！<stop_lip_animation n00210 CLOSE_MOUTH>

17559.<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>不…:

17560.<start_lip_sync n00231 _normal m00001>……:

17566.<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>以前:

17567.<start_lip_sync n00210 _normal m00001>我沒:
